flavorText: Some say Banshees are the hounds of Death, baying to herd their prey into the arms of their master.
name: Banshee
originalText: {X}, {T}: Banshee deals X damage divided evenly between you and target creature or player. Round up for you and down for that creature or player.

rulings.text: If the targeted permanent or player is an illegal target by the time Banshee’s ability resolves, the ability doesn’t resolve. You won’t be dealt damage.

text: {X}, {T}: Banshee deals half X damage, rounded down, to any target, and half X damage, rounded up, to you.
